artist: Artist: Fly NYC; Publisher: Fly NYC
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, reproduction of a colored pencil and collaged illustration, featuring text, images of Saints and cupids, an image of a dead rat, and an illustration of a scream-like figure holding a hammer; 36 pp.
title: The Dystopiation of Sobriety
